title: Стендап
overview: Idrak Mirzalizade, Ariana Lolaeva, Luka Khinikadze, Irina Prikhodko, Ilya Ovechkin, Mikhail Shats. What unites these comedians? They are all not afraid to joke about risky topics.You can watch the performances of exactly these comedians on the Votvot platform. This is humor that has no boundaries: neither political nor geographical. From complex specials on serious topics to short and light stand-ups - you will surely find something to your taste.
